exceptions.tactic: intros M x e1 e2 Hle y Hball.
intros M' x e1 e2 Hle y Hball.

original: intros M x e1 e2 Hle y Hball. apply ball_triangle with (y := x). - apply Hball. - apply ball_sym. apply UniformSpace.ax2 with (m := UniformSpace.class M) (e := e1). + apply ball_sym. apply Hball. + apply Hball.
